chunks.original_latin:
NOTA LECTORIBUS: Hoc opus (Passio S. Mauricii et sociorum) translatum est antequam systema textus interlinearis institueretur. Textus interactivi inspectio non adest pro hoc documento. Ad Latinum originalem et translationem Anglicam separatim videndas, quaesumus repository visitas per nexum infra datum.
https://github.com/wryan14/Latin-Patristic-Texts/tree/main/Patrologia_Latina/vol_50
chunks.cleaned_english_translation: NOTE TO READERS: This work (Passio S. Mauricii et sociorum / The Passion of St. Maurice and his Companions) was translated before the interactive text system was implemented. The interactive text viewer is unavailable for this document. To view the original Latin and English translation separately, please visit the following repository: GitHub - Patrologia Latina Volume 50 Repository
